General.Name: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd. engages in military optical cables and components business in China. The company research, develops, produces, and sells optical fiber, photoelectric system integration, multi-protocol network solutions, and other series products. It also manufactures wires and cables, optical cable, electronic, optoelectronic, optical communication equipment, electronic measuring instruments; computer hardware, software, and peripheral equipment; network equipment, radar and supporting equipment; and industrial control computer components. In addition, the company offers inspection and testing services, as well as sells mechanical and electrical equipment. Further, it provides data processing, storage support, software outsourcing, information system integration, and technology consulting services. The company exports its products. Its products are used in the aviation, aerospace, ships, weapons, and electronics sectors. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
